title: On the Other Side of Alive
description: Dead doesn't mean gone.At least not for Caroline. Following her sudden death, she is given ten years as a spirit to wander amongst the living. While watching over her loved ones, she discovers her life with her husband wasnâ€™t as perfect as she thought, and her death might not have been a tragic accident. Delving deeper into her new existence to find the answers she needs, Caroline encounters mediums, poltergeists, lost souls, an endearing conspiracy theorist, and a mysterious spirit guide who offers cryptic clues to help her on a path only he seems to know. But can she trust any of them, or will the uncertainty surrounding her death doom her to re-enact it for eternity?
author: Jacques Von Kat
